Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~ozheregelya ~VladimirWork We need to test how our performance is today so we know what to improve. Please record your findings in the ticket and assign it back to me.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: ~krw910 Now we spend ~120 seconds on the average to write 1000 NYMs to ledger with --at-once option (1.1.37 RC version / AWS Performance Pool).
